mapper.select: select card_no, card_value, card_password, order_id from INV_D_RECHARGE_CARD where order_id = ${order_id} order by card_value desc

insert into ITF_D_RECHARGE_LOG (log_id, partition_id, order_id, req_time, interface_type, busi_type, serial_number, serial_number_type, charge_money, agent_id, password)
select ${item.LOG_ID}, ${item.PARTITION_ID}, ${order_id}, #{item.req_time}, #{interface_type}, #{busi_type}, #{serial_number}, ${serial_number_type}, ${item.CARD_VALUE}, #{item.CARD_NO}, #{item.CARD_PASSWORD} from dual
